channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s What Jim Jordan And Congressional Republicans Need To Ask Jack Smith On Thursday
item.description: The weaponization of the DOJ against Republicans won’t stop until the depths of the problems are known.

item.title: Trump-appointed prosecutor who pursued indictments against the president's foes is leaving post

item.title: The Largest Tariffs Are on American Job Creation
item.description: A lesson for 2026: Protectionism delivers economic harm without the promised gains.

item.description: A year in his second term in office has done little to cool President Trump's yen for settling scores with opponents, as he used a White House news co...

item.title: Trump signs order targeting institutional investors buying single-family houses
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday ordered his administration to develop rules that would block institutional investors from purchasing single-family homes, e...

item.title: Minnesota Democrats Are Creating A Nullification Crisis Over Immigration
item.description: States are not allowed simply to thwart or undermine federal laws they don’t like. It’s treasonous, and should be treated as such.

item.title: Gabbard Blasts Her Former Party After Mob Attack On Baptist Church
item.description: The anti‑ICE mob 'protest' inside a St. Paul church 'is the latest example of their disrespect for religious freedom,' Gabbard wrote on X.

item.title: Does Trump Need a Portrait of James K. Polk?
item.description: If cold-eyed American expansionism is the theme, there are few better representatives than the eleventh president.

item.title: Jennifer Welch, Irrational, Incensed, And Dangerous, Is The Democrat Party
item.description: Democrats want retribution and are increasingly uninterested in disguising it with any form of pretense about laws or morality.

item.title: SCOTUS Scolds Hawaii For ‘Relegating’ Americans’ Second Amendment Rights To ‘Second-Class Status’
item.description: You're 'relegating the Second Amendment to second-class status,' said Justice Alito.

item.title: Young Mothers Delivers Europe’s Future
item.description: The Dardenne brothers document social development.

item.title: Air Force One returns to Washington due to electrical issue, White House says
item.description: Air Force One was forced to return to Joint Base Andrews late Tuesday night, roughly one hour after it left the facility in suburban Maryland, because...

item.title: Congressman's wife dies three days after Trump commuted son's prison sentence
item.description: The wife of Rep. Steve Womack, Arkansas Republican, died Sunday, just three days after President Trump commuted their son's prison sentence.

item.title: In Venezuela, Which Leader Will Trump Choose?
item.description: Acting President Delcy Rodríguez has the early advantage, but democratic María Corina Machado offers better long-term prospects.

item.title: How Iowa Can Defend Property Rights Through Property Tax Reform
item.description: Governor Reynolds understands that the only way to protect homeowners is to limit local governments’ spending.
